overview_of_class: This will be a bilingual course that will explore the history, current state and future of the English, Spanish and bilingual media that seek to reach the growing Latino audience. Students will immerse themselves in Chicago's vibrant and diverse Latino community, and write and produce multimedia stories and communications in Spanish and English. This course is designed to empower students to understand and tell the stories of Latin Americans in the United States, as well as in Latin America, and reach these important audiences in the languages that they use daily.
name: Bilingual Reporting
title: JOUR JOUR 333-0-20 Bilingual Reporting
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Reserved for Sophomores, Juniors, and Seniors from every undergraduate school only.
